TASK_DESCRIPTION: Use this command to go on quests and complete your daily, weekly and monthly tasks to get rewards.
DAILY_TASKS:
### <:1day:1168129639017893949> __**Daily**__ (Resets {{time}}) 
<:curvedline:979665878503272478> Drop 5 times - {{dropPoints}}/5 
<:curvedline:979665878503272478> Bump on [Sofi.gg](https://sofi.gg/bump) - {{bumpPoints}}/1 
<:curvedline:979665878503272478> Morph a card - {{morphPoints}}/1 
<:curvedline:979665878503272478> Burn 3 cards - {{burnPoints}}/3 
<:curvedline:979665878503272478> Vote on [DiscordBotList](https://discordbotlist.com/bots/sofi/upvote) - {{dblVotePoints}}/1
WEEKLY_TASKS:
### <:7day:1168129632399269908> __**Weekly**__ (Resets {{time}}) 
<:curvedline:979665878503272478> Raid 20 times - {{raidPoints}}/20 
<:curvedline:979665878503272478> Go on a quest 15 times - {{questPoints}}/15 
<:curvedline:979665878503272478> Bump on [Sofi.gg](https://sofi.gg/bump) 15 times - {{bumpPoints}}/15 
<:curvedline:979665878503272478> Drop 100 times - {{dropPoints}}/100 
<:curvedline:979665878503272478> Burn 60 cards - {{burnPoints}}/60 
<:curvedline:979665878503272478> Score 15000+ in a raid - {{raidScore}}/1
MONTHLY_TASKS:
### <:30day:1168129627177365624> __**Monthly**__ (Resets {{time}}) 
<:curvedline:979665878503272478> Vote 50 times on [Top.gg](https://top.gg/bot/853629533855809596) in a month - {{votePoints}}/50
REWARDS_LINE: *You'll receive {{reward}} at the end of the month if you have {{points}} Task Points*

QUEST_REWARDS_THREE: The quest got {{shardCount}} Shards, {{silver}} Silver and {{ingotCount}} {{ingotName}} Ingot
QUEST_REWARDS_FOUR: The quest got {{shardCount}} Shards, {{silver}} Silver, {{xpSacks}} XP Sacks and {{ingotCount}} {{ingotName}} Ingot
